notes: Very modern, recently renovated apartment with sleek white cabinetry, recessed lighting, wood laminate flooring, and quality finishes throughout. The living room is spacious with large windows providing good natural light. For baby safety, the glass panels/partitions and open balcony area with horizontal bar railings may need childproofing; furniture has rounded edges which is positive. The kitchen is fully equipped with gas stove and modern appliances. Overall excellent condition and very clean.
